title: Books?
content: wasn’t there a page here that had lists of various book recommendations?
author: ChuckGroth

comments.content:
Thanks, mili!

Sort of. But I thought there was also a list (or series of) that broke down the books into different design disciplines.

There is. Try searching the site via google. Unless what you want is here

[http://typophile.com/wiki/FAQ%20Books](http://web.archive.org/web/20070224165913/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FAQ%20Books)

This isn’t the page I saw before either. Ah here is the one I was thinking of

[http://typophile.com/books](http://web.archive.org/web/20070224165913/http:/typophile.com/books)
